name: HandelsblattGlobal
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Handelsblatt Global is your window into business and politics in Europe, from the heart of its leading economy. 

More than 260 journalists in 35 countries are dedicated to this mission, unraveling the complexity of the German business world in English, in real time, and with unmatched detail and context. 

This skill gives you an overview of the Top 5 articles on Handelsblatt Global. 
To read an article online, refer to your Alexa app. 

Please be advised that some articles might be freely accessible, while others are available only to subscribers. 
To view subscription offers, visit:
http://hbge.net/alexa
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
